import React, {useState} from 'react' const ImageEditor = () => { const [bBoxes, setBBoxes] = useState([]) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}) const handleSumbit = (e) => { console.log('handleSumbit') const newBBox = {...formData} console.log(newBBox) const bBoxes = this.state.bBoxes bBoxes.push(newBBox) setBBoxes(bBoxes) setFormData({}) e.preventDefault() console.log(bBoxes) } const handleChange = (e) => { const updatedValue = {[e.target.id]: e.target.value} setFormData(formData => ({ ...formData, ...updatedValue })) } return (
) } export default ImageEditor
